title: Analysis of Diff Eq, no context

content.question:
Let f be the function satisfying f′(x) = 4x − 2xf(x) for all real numbers x, with f(0) = 5 and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <mi>∞</mi> </mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H4QaeyOhIukapaqabaGcpeGaamOzamaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4baaca GLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaaGOmaiaac6caaaa@43C6@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>.

(a) Find the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>∞</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>4</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXaWdaeaapeGaaiikaiaaisdacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiaa dIhacaWGMbGaaiikaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIWaaapaqaa8qacqGHEisPa0 Gaey4kIipakiaadIhacaGGPaGaaiykaiaadsgacaWG4baaaa@45B2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. Show the work that leads to your answer.

frqParts.text:
Let f be the function satisfying f′(x) = 4x − 2xf(x) for all real numbers x, with f(0) = 5 and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <mi>∞</mi> </mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H4QaeyOhIukapaqabaGcpeGaamOzamaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4baaca GLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaaGOmaiaac6caaaa@43C6@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>.

(a) Find the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>∞</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>4</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXaWdaeaapeGaaiikaiaaisdacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiaa dIhacaWGMbGaaiikaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIWaaapaqaa8qacqGHEisPa0 Gaey4kIipakiaadIhacaGGPaGaaiykaiaadsgacaWG4baaaa@45B2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. Show the work that leads to your answer.
(b) Use Euler’s method to approximate f(−1), starting at x = 0, with two steps of equal size.
(c) Find the particular solution y = f(x) to the differential equation dy/dx = 4x − 2xy with the initial condition f(0) = 5.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
